roleset.name: desecrate, corrupt, make profane
roleset.note: PROFANE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from profane.01-v)

example.name: args0, 1
example.text: Any Communist Party members or officials who call themselves " princes " are ignorant of history and culture , profane the Communist Party principles , insult the officers with position , disregard the people 's benefits , and individually make reckless statements and expose their own greed .
example.arg: Any Communist Party members or officials who call themselves "princes"

example.name: all args
example.text: They deserted the temple, and therefore God deserted it; they profaned it with their sins and laid it common
